data.Name: fish narc
data.Bio: By exploring the different nuances that rock music allows and expanding from the emo template to hip-hop and beyond, musician, producer, and songwriter Ben Friars-Funkhouser has discovered the middle ground of genre-bending production. With his musical project fish narc, Friars-Funkhouser has helped popularize the application of live guitar playing onto the traditional trap-beat format. Initially receiving his motherâ€™s guitar when he was 12 years old Read more on Last.fm
